0.8.name: wordpress/smart-map
0.8.description:
This plugin allows you to easily insert Google Maps into your blog, by writing a small string und the adress. The maps can be configured to offer directions to or from the location, show or hide the zoom/pan controls. Dieses Plugin kann ganz einfach die Googlemaps karte in deinem Blog einbinden! Ganz einfach durch die Adressangabe und noch einige zusatzinfos wie zoom etc.

Howto: Singlepoint:
[googleMap]Width|Height|Zoom|control Type|show Type|Location info|Descripton[/googleMap] Multiblepoint:
[googleMap]Location1|Description1[/googleMap] [googleMap]Location2|Description2[/googleMap] .... [googleMap]Width|Height|Zoom|control Type|show Type|Location3|Description3[/googleMap]

example: [googleMap]Dresden|[/googleMap] [googleMap]520|200|8|0|0|Bautzen|[/googleMap]

KMZ-File:
[googleMap]Width|Height|Zoom|control Type|show Typ
